attributes.review: The amount of notifications that this app sends is absolutely ridiculous. It runs down my battery so quickly with how much it is doing in the back background of my phone. I noticed that is keeps turning on my location without my permission even when I specifically turn if off. I have also noticed that my camera flash will go off at times even when I don’t have my camera open. And ever since downloading this app a LOT more things that I talk about in my day to day life show up in advertisements on (now all of) anything online related. Would HIGHLY recommend NOT downloading this for you safety!!
attributes.title: Not a safe app!!!

attributes.review: this app is the worst!!!! i downloaded it because i wanted to keep up with my racist, white supremacist, misogynistic, hypocrite president, but i couldn’t even enter the app because it kept crashing!!! if i could give 0 stars I MOST DEFINITELY WOULD. once i was able to get into the app, it asked me for ALL of my personal information (even my social security number) which i think is HIGHLY inappropriate. it was also hard to navigate through because the app design itself was HORRIBLE as if it were designed by a middle schooler🤢🤢🤢 i will NOT be downloading another trump related app again because of how horrible my experience has been with this one!!!
attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH

attributes.review: This dude, our president wants to destroy our country! All of it’s good relations with other country’s, support Russia, and ban tiktok! Mr. president I hope you realize that by banning tiktok you are freeing the American youth to go a protest and join movements such as BLM. And I think we all know that you don’t want anymore problems with the protesters. So change the way you think and think more of how your actions will effect you and the future instead of just effect you, which you’re not really doing in the first place. And now with that said since I’m not gonna have much to do with tiktok gone, I’m gonna go join a protest, oh wait I already did and I’m gonna do it again!
attributes.title: This dude

attributes.review: ok i saw the bad reviews and really wanted martha the talking dog to come visit me. long story short, she didn’t. instead, clifford the big red dog came to my house. idk now he got my address, but somehow he did. i’m not complaining, i love clifford, but this was creepy. my neighbors were terrified. we hung out for a little bit but then i asked him to leave. a ufo popped up out of nowhere and a green laser came down to transport him into space. now you might be thinking that’s crazy, but there’s more. my tiktok is now full of weird videos of donald trump. i think he hacked it. all of the #savebarron tiktoks are saved to my phone. there’s one more detail i have to add. my phone sent all of my contacts fairy comments. it was particularly weird for my grandma who received “your outfit looks good ✨🌈but it would look better on my bedroom floor💖🧚‍♀️” she was creeped out. i hope nobody else downloads this app because it was a real inconvenience for me. i’m sorry to anyone else who has had these issues🍌
attributes.title: martha? no. clifford? yes.

attributes.review: Hahaha 😹 this app is just perfecto!  it only took like 200 years to download!! Isn’t that amazing!! Yes I made so many friends ! Those Oompa Loompas that everyones talking about did in-fact come to my house! What a lovely surprise 😻! And all those pictures of the great and all powerful Cheeto being allowed to run our country was quite the phenomenal sight to look at every time I opened the dang app! 😽....ah yes, this app was such a good waste of my time and data thank you for using all my storage just for me to end up deleting the app!! 😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹😹 well I’m glad I could leave a review! Thank you for blessing us with this app Trump! 🧚🏻‍♂️✨ Trump 2020...out of office! ✨🧚🏻‍♂️
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: I was so happy to support our ✨𝑜𝑅𝑎𝑁𝑔𝑒✨after almost a week of waiting it finally downloaded i creed of happiness I opens the app and need me to sign in so I signed in and someone hacked me while using the app!😱 I just thought it as nothing but I was wrong I started to hallucinate and hearing things😰 I was scared for my life was at risk because of this app. I recommend not using this app if you want the same results now this is the unsettling part... I was up till 4 am staring at my phone terrified for my life there was nudes of our ✨𝑜𝑅𝑎𝑁𝑔𝑒✨ I need therapy after seeing that please deleted this app so younger kids not get this experience this is so inappropriate of him to do.
attributes.title: salmon socks

attributes.review: this app is as trash as the orange cheeto looking dude. i downloaded this at first because i wanted to know how well the president is doing for america, lemme tell u, as soon as i downloaded it everything was WHITE. i am traumatized by it. then when the white finally went away i saw ORANGE!! when i sleep, my sleep paralysis demon would show up, it was the cheeto looking pigly puff, i’d wake up screaming and get zero sleep. i had to go to therapy for it after i deleted it. i’ll tell u this, it’s not worth it. even after therapy it still haunts me, white, orange, when i see that orange dude, when i sleep. i definitely do not recommend getting this, it will SCAR u as it did to me🤧 not trump 2020✨🙈
attributes.title: this is trash

attributes.review: the app took days to download and when it FINALLY downloaded it crashed as soon as i opened it. afterwards i tried turning my phone on but it didn’t work. after two days of charging my phone it turned on and had absolutely nothing on it except a collage of donald which disturbed me because i only downloaded the app to see what it was like. i had to buy a new phone because i couldn’t get rid of the collage and nothing would download onto my phone. my phone was completely taken over by donald trumps admin and i legitimately couldn’t do anything about it. i am petrified of what i’ve seen and this app is scary and traumatizing 💅🏼🥰
attributes.title: spaghetti

attributes.userName: Pervs, u don't need to know
attributes.review: I downloaded this app with the hopes that I would be able to keep track of President Trump’s campaign. Unfortunately, this app is a piece of crap and keeps overloading my phone, freezing the screen and eventually forcing it to quit. I have a relatively new phone so this shouldn’t be the case. I ignored the problem, but eventually it started to affect other apps, forcing them to quit at random. I’ve taken my phone in to the Apple store a couple of times and they have told me it’s likely the result of the app. Wish I could give this 0 stars. *don’t be suspicious, don’t be suspicious* Honestly just a let down. Now I have to rely on Fox to keep up :(
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: ✨i am not happy with what this app provided for me. it was not helpful what so ever and i can’t believe that anyone would choose to ever waste their time on this joke of an app. personally, i cannot believe i wasted my time on it. i am very disappointed and i will not be getting any other app of the sort EVER and i do not recommend anyone else to.. unless you are flat out looking for disappointment and disgrace. even then, you should not put yourself through that. i am able to say this app did not make me feel good about where i live or who i am and i think i speak for all of america as well. this app deserves NOTHING but shame.✨
attributes.title: absolutely ruined my life.
